name: I Refuse to Hibernate!
description:
The bear cubs don't want to hibernate, they want to stay up and play! But try as they might, they just keep nodding off...

How to Play
  • Delay hibernation as long as you can by waking up sleepy bears!
  • Click on an awake bear to wake up bears around it.
  • Choose a shape to wake up different surrounding bears, using your mouse or keys 1-4.
  • Every turn, some bears will randomly get sleepier.
  • A bear that's asleep will hibernate next turn, and then it can't be woken up at all.

Created by rose11/@RoseKeller418 (design, code, art) and celia14/@etc_celia (design, code).
Music is "Electric Fairyland" by Lowther and Bryan (freesoundtrackmusic.com).
Created for Ludum Dare 50 for the theme "Delay the inevitable."

Note: If you use a browser extension that applies dark mode, you may need to disable it to be able to see the UI clearly.
